alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:31AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Susquehanna and east central Bradford Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 630 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rushville, or 11 miles northeast of Wyalusing, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rush, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Montrose, Hallstead, New Milford, Great Bend, Lanesboro, Le Raysville and Friendsville. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
